actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: To direct the Commander of United States Army Special Operations Command to seek to carry out a training program with special operations forces of the Polish Army.
short_title: General Thaddeus Kosciuszko Memorial Exchange Program for Polish-American Defense Cooperation Act

summary.text:
General Thaddeus Kosciuszko Memorial Exchange Program for Polish-American Defense Cooperation Act

This bill requires the U.S. Army Special Operations Command to seek to carry out a training program between its special operations forces and the special forces of the Polish Army, to be known as the General Thaddeus Kosciuszko Memorial Exchange Program for Polish-American Defense Cooperation. Officers and enlisted members may participate the program.

titles.title: General Thaddeus Kosciuszko Memorial Exchange Program for Polish-American Defense Cooperation Act
General Thaddeus Kosciuszko Memorial Exchange Program for Polish-American Defense Cooperation Act
To direct the Commander of United States Army Special Operations Command to seek to carry out a training program with special operations forces of the Polish Army.
